recipesJson.name: Sweet N juicy tobacco
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: I just wanted a nice a sweet , somewhat dessert tobacco recipe. I really wanted the peach to shine. Right now Iâ€™m low on peach flavors and when I use TFA juicy peach I use it high to get the flavor I want. These flavors mix together so well to make a perfect all day vape. Nice, sweet, flavorful, with a nice sweet tobacco exhale. Perfect if your not into long steep times. This is good off the shake.
